mapper.insert:
SELECT spot_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO SPOT( SPOT_NO, CITY_NO, SPOT_NAME, SPOT_DETAIL, SPOT_ADDRESS_DETAIL, SPOT_OPERATING_HOUR, SPOT_CLOSED_DATE, SPOT_PHONE, SPOT_FARE, SPOT_HOMEPAGE, SPOT_PICTURE, SPOT_LATITUDE, SPOT_LONGITUDE, SPOT_USE_NUM ) VALUES( #{no}, #{cityNo}, #{name}, #{detail}, #{addressDetail}, #{operatingHour}, #{closedDate}, #{phone}, #{fare}, #{homepage}, #{picture}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{useNum} )
mapper.select: SELECT spot_no as "no", city_no as "cityNo", spot_name as "name", spot_detail as "detail", spot_address_detail as "addressDetail", spot_operating_hour as "operatingHour", spot_closed_date as "closedDate", spot_phone as "phone", spot_fare as "fare", spot_homepage as "homepage", spot_picture as "picture", spot_latitude as "latitude", spot_longitude as "longitude", spot_use_num as "useNum" FROM spot

SELECT spot_no AS "no", city_no AS "cityNo", spot_name AS "name", spot_detail AS "detail", spot_picture AS "picture", spot_use_num AS "useNum" FROM (SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM / 16) request_page, spot_no, city_no, spot_name, spot_detail, spot_picture, spot_use_num from spot) where request_page = #{value} order by spot_use_num asc

SELECT spot_no as "no", city_no as "cityNo", spot_name as "name", spot_detail as "detail", spot_address_detail as "addressDetail", spot_operating_hour as "operatingHour", spot_closed_date as "closedDate", spot_phone as "phone", spot_fare as "fare", spot_homepage as "homepage", spot_picture as "picture", spot_latitude as "latitude", spot_longitude as "longitude", spot_use_num as "useNum" FROM spot WHERE spot_no = #{vlaue}

SELECT spot_no as "no", city_no as "cityNo", spot_name as "name", spot_detail as "detail", spot_address_detail as "addressDetail", spot_operating_hour as "operatingHour", spot_closed_date as "closedDate", spot_phone as "phone", spot_fare as "fare", spot_homepage as "homepage", spot_picture as "picture", spot_latitude as "latitude", spot_longitude as "longitude", spot_use_num as "useNum" FROM spot WHERE spot_name = #{name} and city_no = #{cityNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE spot SET SPOT_DETAIL = #{detail} , SPOT_ADDRESS_DETAIL = #{addressDetail}, SPOT_OPERATING_HOUR = #{operatingHour}, SPOT_CLOSED_DATE = #{closedDate}, SPOT_PHONE = #{phone}, SPOT_FARE = #{fare}, SPOT_HOMEPAGE = #{homepage}, SPOT_LATITUDE = #{latitude}, SPOT_LONGITUDE = #{longitude} WHERE SPOT_NO = #{no}
